description: Add some easy access storage. This zippered bag sits securely on (or in) your frame, giving you easy access to personal items while you ride.140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating is durable and weather-resistant.Velcro® attachment loops let you secure the bag either on top or in the frame.YKK® Vislon zipper with polyurethane coating seals out the weather.Internal mesh pockets keep you organized.Included: frame protective stickers.
name: EVOC Top Tube Bag
